message.body: (1/2) Hey hunter! Do you think you'll have time to look at that faucet today/tomorrow? I believe it just needs a new cartridge or a new faucet mechanism. Shoul
Yeah. I could come around 1pm today. If your water heater is working you probably need a new faucet. I recommend delta as they are usually easier to install
(1/3) THANK YOU!! Yeah. Everything else is working. There's hot water in the pipe in the wall. Cold comes out but not hot. At first I thought I could replace
(3/3) stuck at work till 5. But I hide the key outside. I can tell you where it is when you get there.
(2/3) the cartridge but there's no brand marking on the faucet. I just want the least expensive/but not total garbage faucet option. Rental property style. I am
I think I got someone else who can do it, so you don't need to scramble today. I still have to buy a faucet and I can't do that till I get out of work at 5
